metadata.title: CVE-2014-3548 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Moodle through2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.x before 2.6.4, and2.7.x before 2.7.1 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via vectors that trigger an AJAX exception dialog.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
